data.text: Adier Nyasaye timo maber ni jo-Israel,
Anto tiendena nodwaro kier.
Nimar ne agombo timbe joma ochayo ji
Gionge gi pek moro amora
Chandruok mamako ji gin ok yudgi
Emomiyo sunga chalonegi thiwni mar ngʼut,
Wengegi onyiedhore gi bor
Gijaro ji kendo giwuoyo ka gihimo ji,
Giwacho weche polo gi dhogi
Emomiyo jogegi doknegi kendo pakogi
Giwacho niya, “Ere kaka Nyasaye nyalo ngʼeyo?
Kama e kaka joma timbegi richo chalo,
Kare asetemo ritora mondo chunya osik kaler kayiem,
Nimar asiko achandora seche duto,
Ka dine bed ni awacho kamano,
To kane atemo winjo tiend gigi duto,
nyaka ne adonjo kama ler mar lemo mar Nyasaye;
Chutho iketogi kama poth-poth,
Mano kaka itiekogi apoya nono,
Gilal nono ka lek ma ngʼato oleko gokinyi,
Kane iya owangʼ,
to pacha nolal kendo ne abedo mofuwo,
Kata kamano an kodi ndalo duto,
Itaya gi rieko mingʼadona
En ngʼa ma an-go e polo makmana in?
Ringra gi chunya nyalo doko manyap,
Joma ni mabor kodi biro lal nono
An to berna ka an but Nyasaye.
